price: Kabisa kusikudanganye kubakia kutangatanga kwa walio kufuru katika nchi.
arabic: لَا يَغُرَّنَّكَ تَقَلُّبُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ فِي ٱلۡبِلَٰدِ
footnotes: Usiathirike, ewe Nabii, kwa kuwaona makafiri wamo katika starehe za neema, na biashara na uchumi unawaendea, wakienda huku na huku katika nchi.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: lā yaghurrannaka taqallubu alladhīna kafarū fī al-bilādi
